overview: What a complete mind fuck this guy plays on this dumb innocent girl. This is not your garden-variety boy meets girl, they fall in love happily ever after bullshit. This guy manipulates this love starved bimbo and plays some serious head games with her. All poor Chelsie Rae wants is for this guy to want her, and to fuck her... but he wont. He would much rather make her beg for his dick, and in the process he decided to capitalize on her need for his attention and make her into his personal fuck toy. This twisted (but creative) dude puts Chelsie through all sorts of degrading sexual escapades... tune in to find out just how depraved it gets!
title: The Animal
